definition: the act of attacking, to enter upon an activity or enterprise
details:
noun
- the act of attacking
= synonyms: attack
- earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something
= synonyms: effort
verb
- to enter upon an activity or enterprise
= example: to enter upon an activity or enterprise
= synonyms: set about, undertake
- to make an effort
= example: to make an effort
= synonyms: assay, try, essay, seek
